<!-- Do not edit this file. It is automatically generated by API Documenter. -->

## Facade.externals property

Specify a non-standard resolution strategy for modules with a matching name.

Signature:

```typescript
externals: externals;
```

## Example

```js
bud.externals({
  jQuery: "window.jquery",
});
```
